text: Baboyaki koyoka mpe kokanisa bikamwa oyo osalaki mpo na bolamu na bango. Bakomaki mito makasi mpe, na botomboki na bango, bamiponelaki mokonzi mpo na kozonga na bowumbu na bango. Kasi lokola ozali Nzambe oyo alimbisaka bato, Nzambe oyo atalisaka ngolu mpe ayokaka mawaÂ ; lokola osilikaka noki te mpe otonda na boboto, otikalaki kosundola bango ata moke te,
